mapper.select: select tcm.id as id, tcm.crew_role as crewRole, tcm.crew_id as crewId, tcm.member_id as memberId, tcm.created_datetime as createdDatetime, tcm.updated_datetime as updatedDatetime, vfcf.file_origin_name as fileOriginName, vfcf.file_path as filePath, vfcf.file_name as fileName, vfcf.file_id as fileId from tbl_crew_member tcm left join view_file_crew_file vfcf on tcm.id = vfcf.crew_id where tcm.id = #{crewId}
